name: Gerard Piqué

structured_info.background: Gerard Piqué is widely regarded as one of the best defenders of his generation, enjoying a successful career at both Manchester United and Barcelona where he won multiple titles. He was a key player for the Spain national team, earning 102 caps.

summary: Gerard Piqué is a retired Spanish professional footballer who excelled as a centre-back for clubs like Manchester United and Barcelona, and represented the Spanish national team 102 times. He's renowned as one of the top defenders of his generation.
